Grammatica Reference Manual

Introduction

This is the reference manual for Grammatica version 1.5.

  • Terms & Definitions
    Definitions and explainations to some of the terminology used in this reference manual.
  • Command-Line Interface
    Description of the command-line interface.
  • Apache Ant Interface
    Description of the Apache Ant interface.
  • Grammar Structure & Declarations
    Overview of the grammar file format and header declaration.
  • Tokens
    Details the syntax of the token declarations in the grammar.
  • Productions
    Details the syntax of the production declarations in the grammar.
  • Handling Ambiguities
    Examples of some grammar ambiguities and how they can be handled.
  • Error Recovery
    Information about the automatic error recovery mechanisms.
  • Examples
    Examples of a complete grammar file and Java source code for creating a parser.

Grammatica 1.5 (2009-03-07). See the Grammatica web site for more information.
